title: Plugin Manifest
description: Schema for workflow engine plugin manifests in the GoCodeAlone/workflow-registry

name.description: Unique plugin name (e.g. http, messaging, my-custom-plugin)

description.description: Short description of what this plugin provides

source.description: Source repository (Go module path or URL)

path.description: Path within the source repository to the plugin package

type.description: Plugin type: builtin (shipped with engine), external (community/third-party), ui (frontend extension)

tier.description: Plugin tier: core (maintained by GoCodeAlone), community (third-party), premium (paid)

moduleTypes.description: Module type identifiers this plugin registers (e.g. http.server, messaging.broker)

stepTypes.description: Pipeline step type identifiers this plugin registers (e.g. step.validate, step.http_call)

triggerTypes.description: Trigger type identifiers this plugin registers (e.g. http, schedule, event)

workflowHandlers.description: Workflow handler type identifiers this plugin registers (e.g. http, pipeline, statemachine)

wiringHooks.description: Post-init wiring hook names this plugin provides

checksums.description: SHA-256 checksums keyed by version string for integrity verification

downloads.description: Binary download artifacts for this plugin version

url.description: Download URL for the binary archive

assets.description: Asset capabilities provided by this plugin

config.description: Plugin provides config fragments via ConfigProvider
